appearances.title: U.S. House of Representatives House Tributes to Late Rep. LaMalfa : CSPAN : January 10, 2026 2:54pm-3:59pm EST
appearances.snippet: jeff hurd. >> mr. speaker, our colleague doug lamalfa passed away on monday and i wanted to take just a minute. he would have liked that to honor him the best way. i know how plainly doug believed that we should speak clearly, not in jargon. he had a whiteboard in his office labeled unacceptable words, and he meant it. words like stakeholders, empower and equity were banned. he thought government should sound more like the people it serves. he hated what i called lamalfa isms, overcomplicated government explanations, explanations for simple things like saying the transportation infrastructure is undergoing a temporary operational suspension, pending structural optimization. instead of just saying the bridge is closed for repairs. doug loved this institution. he loved the west, and he loved one minute speeches. i'll miss his humor, his directness, and the clarity he brought to a town that too often hides behind big words. may he rest in peace. thank you and i yield. >> thank you to the gentleman from mi
